title: ‘Stranger Things’ Season 3 Mega-Pod | The Watch
description:
We break down the entirety of ‘Stranger Things’ Season 3, including our favorite things from the season (1:05), where the show fell short (43:58), who won the season (57:42), and some predictions for the fourth season (65:53).

Major Spoilers for the third season in the episode.

Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Mallory Rubin

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
